description:
Perfection in every sense!! A chic coastal offering, this one-of-a-kind contemporary showstopper with cutting edge design is one to place on your inspection list.

'”The Passage” - an admired locale in a prestigious Pelican Waters estate, enter into this stunning home and you will immediately know you are truly somewhere special.

Exceptionally tailored with superb finishes throughout, the home has been planned to provide a unique, low maintenance living experience. Incorporating a distinctive fusion of timber accents, polished concrete and swathes of glass, this blend of city luxury with relaxed coastal style truly makes for a one-off home to be enjoyed.

Inspiration for urban living is evident as you step past the gated breezeway and landscaped seating area and continue through the stunning timber and glass door.

Elevated 3.7m ceilings adorn the casual open plan living space and sleek designer kitchen, heightening the sense of space and creating a light filled interior. Timeless in its finish and boasting stone benchtops, gas cooking, breakfast bar and expansive storage, the kitchen is a space where entertaining is made easy. Glass stacker doors provide a connection to the North facing covered alfresco and azure waters of the inground pool, inviting the peaceful verdant garden landscape within.

Complimenting the spaces is the lavish ensuited master, two additional bedrooms, main bathroom plus a separate multipurpose room or 4th bedroom option.

Cleverly designed with cross ventilation and breezeways - air conditioning is hardly required

Featuring one of the largest blocks in The Passage and side access for the boat, caravan or trailer, this designer residence promises lifestyle excellence beyond compare.

Whether you're relaxing at the nearby Golden Beach precinct, taking in the stunning landscape of the magnificent Pumicestone Passage waterways on your kayak, walking the extensive coastal pathways or dropping in a fishing line – the variety of lifestyle choices are within easy reach and there to be enjoyed.

The magic of this location is further enhanced by its close proximity to the Caloundra foreshore, local parks, shopping destinations, restaurants and the upcoming Pelican Waters Marina. A full service marina yard that will offer state of the art dry boat storage and wet berths, this community facility will be a welcome asset for the coast.

Exceeding expectations, this unique home on a 622m2 block delivers more than meets the eye and is not to be missed!

Contemporary modern offering - low maintenance living
Sizeable 622m2 allotment
North facing rear yard
Exceptional indoor/outdoor living
Polished concrete flooring
Elevated (approx. 3.7m) ceilings
Wired surround sound throughout
Solar – 6.5kh (approx.)
Split system a-con in the master suite
Sparkling salt water inground pool
Easy access to Pumicestone Passage
Close proximity to shops, restaurants and schools
